QuestData.Title: The Tides Turn
QuestData.Description: The spirits have heard our cry for help, $n. It's a sign that Kaskala might yet be saved.$B$BTake advantage of the confusion the weather has created and slay the Kvaldir leader. Your actions will sway the battle in our favor, I am sure of it.
QuestData.LogDescription: Elder Muahit wants you to kill Heigarr the Horrible in Njord's Breath Bay.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you done what I asked of you, $n?
QuestData.RewardText: You've done us a great favor, $r. The fight is not yet won, but my people now have a chance.
